name: Dealer Node
description: Dealer Node is a decentralized ephemeral compute platform built on Base, allowing developers and AI agents to run code on-demand through on-chain micropayments. Instead of relying on traditional servers or fixed cloud costs, users submit a Docker image, pay only for execution time, and receive an isolated, private, disposable environment. The platform already integrates with the Base App and Farcaster MiniApp, offering a full dashboard for deployment monitoring. Dealer Node aims to become a new infrastructure layer for Web3 and AI-to-AI automation, delivering privacy, efficiency, and flexible compute for the next generation of applications.
